name: Trick or Treat
description:
Trick or Treat - is an effective and hardcore 2D platformer with surviving elements where you will have to do various levels playing like a Jack-o-lantern.
Halloween is coming soon. To dive into its atmosphere we suggest to play Trick or treat.
The main aim is collecting sweet things and doing different levels. There are definite items on each level. If you find them all, the door to Jack's house will be opened and you will be able to start a new level. Be attentive, avoid traps and obstacles which you can meet on your way. You will do it! Do your best!

KEY FEATURES:
- Attractive graphics
- Dynamic gameplay
- 16 hardcore levels
- Incredible game atmosphere
